content: I'm actually planning to attend the trade show with a specific goal in mind - to find suppliers for my handmade jewelry business. I've been participating in local markets, like the Local Artisans Market in the park, and I'm looking to expand my product line with unique and high-quality gemstones. Do you think the trade show would be a good fit for my business, and are there any specific tips you can give me for navigating the event as a small business owner?
